title: 👩‍🎓 Default Roles
description:
Enabling this feature allows me to automatically assign roles to new members when they join your server

📝 **Settings**

:flying_disc: **Default Roles - Bots:** Default roles that will be assigned when a bot joins the guild
:flying_disc: **Default Roles - Users:** Default roles that will be assigned when a user joins the guild
footer: • Use the command /report to tell me a bug

title: Default Roles (Users)
description: Choose which roles will be automatically assigned when a **bot** joins the guild
footer: • Use the command /report to tell me a bug

title: Default Roles (Members)
description: Choose which roles will be automatically assigned when a **member** joins the guild
footer: • Use the command /report to tell me a bug

title: :white_check_mark: Alright?
description:
Enabling this feature allows me to automatically assign roles to new members when they join your server

📝 **Settings**
footer: • Use the command /report to tell me a bug
